intro: The most terrifying randomly generated escape horror has evolved and returned!
description:
■Randomly generated dungeons with increased volume!
The vast corridors you explore change shape every time you play.
You are always lost. But that's what makes it super fun!
Adapt to the ever-changing situation and aim for the goal!
The number of randomly generated maps in the game is much larger than in the previous game!

■New karuta system!
Collect karuta cards with various special effects!
Find your own combination and establish your own style of play!

■A variety of items that have evolved!
The number of items in this game is more than in the previous game!
And they are even more peculiar than in the previous game!
Use a variety of items to make your way in the world!

■New Prowlers
All the new roamers that appear in the game have been completely renewed!
And they are even tougher and scarier...!
Your judgment, quick thinking, and the courage to overcome your fears will be put to the test.
Use all your strength to overcome adversity!

■From beginners to experts
In this title, you can choose from a more dynamic range of difficulty levels.
Even those who are not good at games can now easily play through to the ending.
Of course, we are ready to show you a hell of a lot more than the previous title if you want...

■New Story
This game tells the story of a girl named "Shigure.
She found peace in death and took her own life, but....
The new story told in this new work can be enjoyed even if you have not played the previous work.
Of course, you will enjoy it even more if you have played the previous one.
